about_the_game:
《Story》


I, Takeo Kashima, am currently taking a short break in the office of a hot spring inn.
That inn is where I grew up.

My parents are away from the inn for a few days to attend some sort of meeting in town.
With two pairs of hands gone, this small inn can't keep up with all the work. That's why I was called in for the summer.

"Oh? Tired already?"

The person who appears at the door is Yukari Kashima.
She's my older brother's wife, or in other words, my sister-in-law.
Right now, she's working as the proprietress of this inn.

"Or… is it that you can't get motivated without a reward?
If you want, I could give you one!"

My brother… passed away last year due to illness.
That makes Yukari a widow.
In light of that, I think it's inappropriate for her to joke around like this.
In front of the guests, she's ever the gentle and elegant hostess, but… she's always like this with me.

That night… I get lost in thought while soaking in the open-air bath, the pride of the inn.
As I gaze up at the starry night sky while soaking in the tub, someone enters the bath.

"Uh… Yukari? Wh-why are you here?"

《Characters》


Yukari Kashima (VA: Riko Amamori)
Takeo's sister-in-law.
Since Takeo's brother passed away, she is a widow.
She's prone to joking around as a way to cope with her husband's death.
She's actually quite shy.
She's such a lightweight that just one small cup of booze is enough to get her drunk.

*Before purchasing this product, we highly recommend that you play the demo [Japanese only] to check if the game works properly on your computer in your region.
*Appetite is the licensor of this game. For inquiries about the product, please contact Tensei Games.

《Contents》

  • 15 separate CGs (Over 80 CGs in total!)
  • 15 H-scenes
  • Japanese voice acting for the main female character

《Features》

  • You can have the same experience as the protagonist.
  • Two endings
  • CG Gallery Mode
  • Scene Replay Mode

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violence and sexual scenes. Within those, there are also scenes that are possible to be interpreted as sexual violence or non-consensual sex.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium4 / AMD Athlon64 or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Over 800 X 600 resolution Over TrueColor (32bit)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectSound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2duo / AMD Phenom or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Over 800 X 600 resolution Over TrueColor (32bit)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectSound

short_description: I've come back to the hot spring inn where I grew up to help out for the summer. After finishing work one day, I have a soak in the open-air bath and get lost in thought. That's when my sister-in-law Yukari comes in…
